name: Everything Bagel Crescent Bites
author: France C
summary: The whole family will love these savory crescent bites! They are super easy to make and are great on their own or as part of your next brunch. Feel free to try different varieties of cream cheese.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package crescent dough sheet (such as Pillsbury®)
4 ounces garlic and herb cream cheese spread (such as Philadelphia®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Unroll dough on a clean surface
Roll out dough, if necessary, into a 8x12-inch rectangle
Using a pizza cutter or knife, cut the dough into 6 rows by 4 rows to make 24 squares
Divide cream cheese amongst each square, placing approximately 3/4 teaspoon in the middle of each
Bring all 4 corners up over the cheese and pinch the corners together lightly; place on the prepared baking sheet
Whisk together egg and water and lightly brush over each crescent bite
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes
Let cool slightly before eating as filling will be hot
